data.title: Dr. Balveen (Biba) Singh, DO, a Psychiatrist practicing in New City, NY
data.meta_description: Dr. Balveen Singh is a psychiatrist practicing in New City, NY. Dr. Singh is a medical doctor specializing in the
data.text:
Dr. Balveen Singh is a psychiatrist practicing in New City, NY. Dr. Singh is a medical doctor specializing in the care of mental health patients. As a psychiatrist, Dr. Singh diagnoses and treats mental illnesses. Dr. Singh may treat patients through a variety of methods including medications, psychotherapy or talk therapy, psychosocial interventions and more, depending on each individual case. Different medications that a psychiatrist might prescribe include antidepressants, antipsychotic mediations, mood stabilizers, stimulants, sedatives and hypnotics. Dr. Singh treats conditions like depression, anxiety, OCD, eating disorders, bipolar disorders, personality disorders, insomnia, ADD and other mental illnesses.

Dr. Singh’s career in medicine began in 0, when he graduated with his Medical Degree from the New York Institute of Technology College of Osteopathic Medicine. After medical school, Dr. Balveen (Biba) Singh, DO completed residency at Garnet Health Medical Center, Inpatient Behavioral Health Unit. Dr. Singh is board certified in psychiatry by the psychiatry. Dr. Balveen (Biba) Singh, DO currently provides care to patients at 216 Congers Rd, New City, NY 10956.
